meanings.definition: A set of steps leading from one floor to another.
meanings.sent1: The stairway in the library goes up to the second floor.
meanings.sent2: She tripped on the stairway while carrying a stack of books.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the stairway was a fun obstacle course.
meanings.sent4: His ambition was the stairway to success.
meanings.sent5: The dimly lit stairway creaked with each step.

meanings.sent1: The narrow stairway in the old house was steep.
meanings.sent2: They raced up the stairway to reach the top first.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel used the stairway of branches to climb the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed down the stairway.
meanings.sent5: The grand stairway in the mansion was adorned with a red carpet.
